attributes.additional_details:
Nut Allergy sufferers should have their own food section in the supermarkets as a lot of foods are misleading, how do we know what contains nuts and what dosent if they are all produced in the same areas, surely people with nut allergies should be taken very seriously as Anaphylaxis is a very serious and life threatening condition if something 'contains' or may contain nuts is consumed by a nut allergy sufferer.
The supermarkets are big enough to ensure they have a nut free preparation area.
